resources.string:
• We reserve the right to accept or refuse membership in our discretion.\n
• We may send email and other communications related to Hatsphere and your plan membership. (regardless of any setting or preferences related to your account).\n
• The customers are not permitted to purchase products for the purpose of resale, rental, or to ship to their customers or potential customers using your plan benefits
• From time to time, Hatsphere may choose in its sole discretion to add or remove any benefits from any of our provided plan.\n
• We reserve the right to accept or refuse membership in our discretion.\n
